articles.title: Arjen Robben's retirement U-turn inspired by Michael Jordan's Last Dance documentary - Mirror Online
articles.description: Ex-Chelsea star has returned to his hometown club Groningen - but only after they showed him clips from the hit series about the NBA legend who reversed his retirement in style
articles.content:
Arjen Robben's decision to come out of retirement was inspired by The Last Dance documentary on the career of NBA legend Michael Jordan.
